content: ***the chevron tassel temperature blanket is constructed from the bottom up in row of tunisian simple stitch chevron *** the forward pass of a row is one day and the return pass of that same row is the next day my blanket was designed to represent a historical year the year i got married my blanket starts in march 2010 and includes 13 months to represent the 13 years i ve been married after binding off i made a pile of yarn strands with my leftover yarn to create a twisted fringe on the edges of my blanket making fringe this way prevented having to weave in a year s worth of ends **free pattern includes ** -tutorial videos for tunisian chevron stitch and making twisted tassels -suggestions on finding and using fingering weight yarn -a detailed breakdown of choosing my colors -links to additional temperature blanket resources and designs **materials** -5mm tunisian crochet hook with 20 + cord -scissors **techniques** -tunisian crochet -chevron stitch -changing colors -twisted tassels **measurements** 60 long x 48 wide with 13 months included make your blanket smaller by working only 12 months for full calendar
